view

Class PageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.PageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PageView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements GObserver
    The graphical representation of a page.
    Author:
    Nikola Jovanovic
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
